kjv_def: add, again, give more, increase, lay unto, proceed further, speak to any more
strongs_def: to place additionally, i.e. lay beside, annex, repeat
outline:
1. to put to
  2. to add
    1. i.e. to join to, gather with any company, the number of one's followers or companions
      1. he was gathered to his fathers i.e. died
